TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExpressionEditorAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies the design-time editor of the expression builder. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ExpressionEditorAttribute class specifies the design-time expression editor for the expressions that are handled by an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder> class.
When editing a control property, you can set the property value to an expression by using an editor for the expression.
When developing an expression builder, you can mark the builder with the ExpressionEditorAttribute attribute to set the editor type value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string typeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the type to associate with the .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified type name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the ExpressionEditorAttribute constructor to initialize an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class using a type name. To initialize the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class using a type object, use the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The type reference to associate with the .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified type object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the ExpressionEditorAttribute constructor to initialize an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class using a type object. To initialize the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class using a type name, use the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

Docs.summary: Used by an expression editor to retrieve the editor type name.
Docs.value: The name of the editor type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the EditorTypeName property to retrieve the name of the type of editor that is associated with this instance of the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute> attribute is the value of its <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionEditorAttribute.EditorTypeName%2A> property.
